home.title: Connecting those going through difficult times with a path to a brighter tomorrow

content.0: The Brighter Tomorrow Map was built for you by the Focallocal Positive Action Community
content.1: A global Movement for anyone who has had enough of the issues troubling this world and are taking action to tackle their root causes
content.2: This map is a tool to reconnect our communities, so we can effectivly support each other through difficult times
content.3: This map aims to help people who are homeless to find the resources they need to meet their basic needs and find a path to a brighter future

items.smiley: post free resources you find which people can use to meet their basic needs
items.friends: connect with people who want to help, or those nearby who need it
items.share: offer things you can do to make a difference to the lives of others living locally

content.0: Use the map to find and post all the free resources in your local area. showers. food. shelter. charging stations. support groups.
content.1: Many people nearby want to help you build a happier life. Their kind offers of support can be found on the map
content.2: Please don't ask those offering support for money, that's not what this map is for. Many charities now advise people not to, and so it risks pushing away those who are trying to help you
content.3: Difficult times come, and they go. its normal. People will help if you help yourself. Take one step forwards at a time and life will get better

content.0: Post every free resource you find onto the map. suit hire for interviews. shelters or religious buildings offering showers. support groups. pass it on coffee. where to find free food
content.1: The helpless feeling of walking past people who are sleeping on the streets, wanting to help but not knowing what you can do. That changes today!
content.2: Browse our suggestions for things you can offer to support people struggling nearby. Post your offers onto the map. like;
content.3: CV/resume building help. Teach a skill. An intro, old books and advice on starting in your profession. Or simply buy a cup of tea, or a meal to share a friendly chat and likely some rare normality
content.4: Print the map as a valuable guide to give those on the streets, helping them access resources to improve and change their situation

text.0: Simply click the buttons above and copy/paste the info below.
